attributes.action: NOT encourage the U.K. to host the 2018 World Cup; however it is funded.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in oppositon to a petition which asks for the hosting of this World Cup to be encouraged provided the cost is not met by taxation.  I am opposed to its coming here under ANY circumstances; not least due to concerns about hooliganism and, to a lesser extent (since it would, presumably, take place at Wembley), concern about my freedom of movement, as a Londoner, while it was taking place.
